title: Dom F.E. Hug el et Fils, 'Gentil'  Alsace ‘10
text: Full and fruity with a dry finish.

title: Sauvignon - St. Bris ‘10
text: Crisp sauvignon from vineyards near Chablis.

title: Sipp Mack, Pinot Gris Reserve, Alsace ‘12
text: Melon and orange fruit with a refreshing finish.

title: Ca dei Frati, Lugana, Veneto ‘10
text: Rounded and ripe from the shores of Lake Garda.

title: Jose Pariente, Verdejo, Rueda ‘10
text: Aromatic, lime and elderflower; crisp and refreshing.

title: Richter, 'Zeppelin' Riesling, Mosel ‘09
text: Off dry with honeysuckle & citrus, refreshing acidity and low alcohol level.

title: Remondo, 'Montesa' Rioja Crianza ‘07
text: Award winning winemaker, soft and ripe.

title: Banfi, 'Belnero' Montalcino I.G.T. ‘06
text: Complexity of good Brunello - fraction of the price.
